addReward(uint256,uint256,bool,uint256,u.notice: sets a reward for a seasonId and at level

burn(address,uint256,uint256).notice: allows the owner/crafting contract to burn tokens

checkType(uint256).notice: checks a reward type by id; will revert for 0

claimReward(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: claims a reward for a seasonId and at level

delegate(address,uint256).notice: delegates msg.sender's tokens to a delegatee

delegatedBy(address,address).notice: tracks who delegates to whom and how much

getLootboxOptionByIdx(uint256,uint256).notice: gets a lootboxOption by lootboxId and index

getLootboxOptionsLength(uint256).notice: gets a lootboxOptions length by lootboxId

getMaxLevel(uint256).notice: gets the max level for a seasonId

giveXp(uint256,uint256,address).notice: gives xp to a user upon completion of quests

isRewardClaimed(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: checks a user claim status on a reward for a seasonId and at level

isUserPremium(address,uint256).notice: checks if a user has premium pass

level(address,uint256).notice: gets user level for a seasonId

mint(address,uint256,uint256).notice: allows the owner/crafting contract to mint tokens

undelegate(address,uint256).notice: undelegates the tokens from a delegatee

userdoc.notice: Battle Pass is a system that rewards users for completing creator specific quests during established time periods known as seasons Each creator gets 1 unique Battle Pass and the contract allows multiple seasons Tracks user progress at each level and across seasons Allows for giving out rewards at specified levels Rewards can be { NFTs, Tokens, Lootboxes, Redeemables }

params._level: level at which to change the reward
params._seasonId: seasonId for which to change the reward
params.premium: true when setting a premium reward

claimReward(uint256,uint256,bool).details: reverts when: user claims a reward for a level at which they are NOT user claims an already claimed reward user claims a premium reward, but is NOT eligible for it when a user has a premium pass and it is their first time claiming a premium reward then burn 1 pass from their balance and set claimedPremiumPass to be true a user can own multiple premium passes just like any other reward it will NOT be burned if the user has already claimed a premium reward

params._level: level at which to claim the reward
params._seasonId: seasonId for which to claim the reward
params.premium: true when claiming a premium reward

constructor.details: crafting is allowed to mint burn tokens in battle pass

params.amount: the amount of tokens to delegate
params.delegatee: the address receiving the delegated tokens

getMaxLevel(uint256).details: max level is reached when xpToCompleteLevel == 0

params._seasonId: seasonId for which to give xp

params.premium: true when checking for premium rewards
params.user: user address for which to check

isUserPremium(address,uint256).details: user is considered premium when:     they own one premium pass or     they have already claimed a premium reward

params._seasonId: seasonId for which to check for premium pass

returns._0: true when user has premium status

level(address,uint256).details: breaks at the last level, where xpToCompleteLevel is 0

params._seasonId: seasonId for which to get level
params.user: user address for which to get level

newLootbox((uint256[2],uint256[],uint256.details: reverts when: joint rarity of all LootboxOptions does not add up to 100 ids.length != qtys.length ids are invalid

params.options: all the LootboxOptions avaliable in a lootbox

params.levelInfo: info about each level, levelInfo[0] corresponds to info on a level 0 last level must be (levelInfo.length - 1) and must have xpToCompleteLevel == 0

openLootbox(uint256).details: upto user to not send a bad id here.

params._uri: new string with the format https://<>/creatorId/id.json

params._level: level at which to change xp
params._seasonId: seasonId for which to change xp

undelegate(address,uint256).details: revert if msg.sender tries to undelegate more tokens than they delegated

params.amount: the amount of tokens to undelegate
params.delegatee: the address who recevied the delegated tokens

IncorrectLootboxOptions().details: used when the details for a new lootbox are incorrect

IncorrectSeasonDetails().details: use when an error occurrs while creating a new season

InvalidId(uint256).details: used when an id is not within any of the approved id ranges

NeedPremiumPassToClaimPremiumReward().details: use when user claims a premium reward without owning a premium pass or claimedPremiumPass is false

NoAccess().details: used when a non owner/crafting address tries to mint/burn

NotAtLevelNeededToClaimReward().details: use when user claims a reward for a level at which they are NOT

RewardAlreadyClaimed().details: use when user claims an already claimed reward

@dev use when user claims a reward for a level at which they are NOT

@dev use when user claims an already claimed reward
@dev crafting is allowed to mint burn tokens in battle pass
